在.definition: to exist; to be alive; (of sb or sth) to be (located) at; (used before a verb to indicate an action in progress)

在乎.definition: to rest with; to lie in; to be due to (a certain attribute); (often used in the negative) to care about

在位.definition: to be on the throne; to reign; to hold a particular leadership position

在先.definition: to come first; previous; prior; beforehand; first; formerly

在千鈞一髮之際.pinyin: zai4 qian1 jun1 - yi1 fa4 zhi1 ji4
在千鈞一髮之際.definition: at the critical moment; in the nick of time

在即.definition: near at hand; imminent; within sight

在地.definition: (Tw) local; native (from Taiwanese 在地, Tai-lo pr. [tsāi-tē])

在場.definition: to be present; to be on the scene

在天之靈.definition: soul and spirit of the deceased

在天願做比翼鳥，在地願做連理枝.pinyin: zai4 tian1 yuan4 zuo4 bi3 yi4 niao3 , zai4 di4 yuan4 zuo4 lian2 li3 zhi1
在天願做比翼鳥，在地願做連理枝.definition: In the sky to be two birds flying wing to wing, on earth to be two trees with branches intertwined; wishing for conjugal bliss

在家.definition: to be at home; (at a workplace) to be in (as opposed to being away on official business 出差[chu1chai1]); (Buddhism etc) to remain a layman (as opposed to becoming a monk or a nun 出家[chu1jia1])

在家千日好，出門一時難.pinyin: zai4 jia1 qian1 ri4 hao3 , chu1 men2 yi1 shi2 nan2
在家千日好，出門一時難.definition: lit. at home, one can spend a thousand days in comfort, but spending a day away from home can be challenging (idiom); fig. there's no place like home

在家靠父母，出外靠朋友.pinyin: zai4 jia1 kao4 fu4 mu3 , chu1 wai4 kao4 peng2 you5
在家靠父母，出外靠朋友.definition: one depends on one's parents when at home, and on one's friends when away from home (idiom)

在家靠父母，出門靠朋友.pinyin: zai4 jia1 kao4 fu4 mu3 , chu1 men2 kao4 peng2 you5
在家靠父母，出門靠朋友.definition: one depends on one's parents when at home, and on one's friends when away from home (idiom)

在我看.definition: in my opinion; in my view

在所不計.definition: irrespective of; to have no concerns whatsoever about

在所不辭.definition: not to refuse to (idiom); not to hesitate to

在握.definition: (fig.) to hold in one's hands; to be within grasp

在教.definition: to be a believer (in a religion, esp. Islam)

在於.definition: to rest with; to lie in; to be due to (a certain attribute); (of a matter) to be determined by; to be up to (sb)

在望.definition: within view; visible; (fig.) in the offing; around the corner; soon to materialize

在校.definition: (attributive) to be enrolled in a school (or university etc)

在編.definition: to be on the regular payroll; to be on the permanent staff

在職.definition: to be employed; to be in post; on-the-job

在華.definition: within China; during one's visit to China

在行.definition: to be adept at sth; to be an expert in a trade or profession

在讀.definition: to be studying (at a school or research institute)

在身.definition: to possess; to be occupied or burdened with (work, a contract, a lawsuit)

在逃.definition: to be at large (of a criminal)

在這之前.definition: before then; up until that point

在那兒.definition: (adverbial expression indicating that the attention of the subject of the verb is focused on what they are doing, not distracted by anything else); just ...ing (and nothing else)

在野.definition: to be out of (political) office; to be out of power
